text: Gandria is a quarter and former municipality in Lugano in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 4 April 2004 the former municipalities of Breganzona, Cureggia, Davesco-Soragno, Gandria, Pambio-Noranco, Pazzallo, Pregassona and Viganello merged into the city of Lugano. == Other websites == * Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Neighbourhoods in Lugano
title: Gandria
